front.title: Internet Printing Protocol (IPP): Job and Printer Set Operations

abstract.t: This document specifies 3 additional OPTIONAL operations for use with the Internet Printing Protocol/1.0 (IPP) [RFC2565, RFC2566], and IPP/1.1 [RFC2911, RFC2910]. The end user, operator, and administrator Set-Job-Attributes and Set-Printer-Attributes operations are used to modify IPP Job objects and Printer objects, respectively. The third administrator Get-Printer-Supported-Values operation returns values that the IPP Printer will accept for setting its 'xxx-supported' attributes.
